stylesheet.name: Communications with Descriptions
stylesheet.description: Outputs a table of all Communications with their Descriptions

stylesheet.name: Speakers with Descriptions
stylesheet.description: Outputs a table of all Speakers with their Descriptions

stylesheet.name: Metadata profile
stylesheet.description: Outputs a profile of metadata keys and values

stylesheet.name: Complete inline metadata
stylesheet.description: Outputs all communication with their respective speakers inline. Tries to calculate the ages of the speakers at the time of the Communication (requires Location type='Geburt' or 'birth')
